mapper.sql: RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, PDM_TBL_ID, PDM_TBL_PNM, PDM_TBL_LNM, BF_PDM_TBL_PNM, RQST_DCD, RVW_STS_CD, RVW_CONTS, VRF_CD, VRF_RMK, MDL_LNM, UPP_SUBJ_LNM, SUBJ_ID, SUBJ_LNM, STD_APL_YN, PART_TBL_YN, DW_TRG_TBL_YN, CRG_USER_ID, CRG_USER_NM, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, CTD_FCY, DEL_CRI, DEL_MTD, BCK_FCY, FULL_PATH,USER_RQST_CNTN

RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, PDM_TBL_ID, PDM_TBL_PNM, PDM_TBL_LNM, BF_PDM_TBL_PNM, RQST_DCD, RVW_CONTS, VRF_CD, VRF_RMK, MDL_LNM, UPP_SUBJ_LNM, SUBJ_ID, SUBJ_LNM, STD_APL_YN, PART_TBL_YN, DW_TRG_TBL_YN, CRG_USER_ID, CRG_USER_NM, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, CTD_FCY, DEL_CRI, DEL_MTD, BCK_FCY, FULL_PATH,USER_RQST_CNTN
mapper.select:
SELECT /* WaqPdmTblMapper.selectPdmTblListbyMst */ A.RQST_NO, A.RQST_SNO, A.PDM_TBL_ID, A.PDM_TBL_PNM, A.PDM_TBL_LNM, A.BF_PDM_TBL_PNM, A.RQST_DCD, A.RVW_CONTS, A.VRF_CD, A.VRF_RMK, A.MDL_LNM, A.UPP_SUBJ_LNM, A.SUBJ_ID, A.SUBJ_LNM, A.STD_APL_YN, A.PART_TBL_YN, A.DW_TRG_TBL_YN, A.CRG_USER_ID, A.CRG_USER_NM, A.OBJ_DESCN, A.OBJ_VERS, A.REG_TYP_CD, A.FRS_RQST_DTM, A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, A.RQST_DTM, A.RQST_USER_ID, A.APRV_DTM, A.APRV_USER_ID, A.CTD_FCY, A.DEL_CRI, A.DEL_MTD, A.BCK_FCY, A.FULL_PATH
, CASE WHEN A.RVW_STS_CD = '2' THEN '2' ELSE '0' END AS RVW_STS_CD
, A.RVW_STS_CD
, CASE WHEN A.VRF_CD = '2' THEN '#FF0000' ELSE CASE WHEN A.VRF_CD = '5' THEN '#0000FF' END END AS FontColor , U.USER_NM AS RQST_USER_NM , A.USER_RQST_CNTN FROM WAQ_PDM_TBL A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U ON A.RQST_USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND U.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND A.VRF_CD = '1'
ORDER BY A.RQST_SNO
mapper.insert: insert /* WaqPdmTblMapper.insert */ into WAQ_PDM_TBL (RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, PDM_TBL_ID, PDM_TBL_PNM, PDM_TBL_LNM, BF_PDM_TBL_PNM, RQST_DCD, RVW_STS_CD, RVW_CONTS, VRF_CD, VRF_RMK, MDL_LNM, UPP_SUBJ_LNM, SUBJ_ID, SUBJ_LNM, STD_APL_YN, PART_TBL_YN, DW_TRG_TBL_YN, CRG_USER_ID, CRG_USER_NM, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, CTD_FCY, DEL_CRI, DEL_MTD, BCK_FCY ) values (#{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pdmTblId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pdmTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pdmTblLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bfPdmTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mdlLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uppSubjLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subjLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stdAplYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partTblYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dwTrgTblYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crgUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crgUserNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctdFcy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delCri,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delMtd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bckFcy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

SELECT /* WaqPdmTblMapper.insertSelective */ IFNULL(MAX(RQST_SNO), 0) + 1 FROM WAQ_PDM_TBL WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo}

mapper.update:
update /* WaqPdmTblMapper.updateByPrimaryKeySelective */ WAQ_PDM_TBL
PDM_TBL_ID = #{pdmTblId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PDM_TBL_PNM = #{pdmTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PDM_TBL_LNM = #{pdmTblLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BF_PDM_TBL_PNM = #{bfPdmTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MDL_LNM = #{mdlLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPP_SUBJ_LNM = #{uppSubjLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUBJ_ID = #{subjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUBJ_LNM = #{subjLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STD_APL_YN = #{stdAplYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PART_TBL_YN = #{partTblYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DW_TRG_TBL_YN = #{dwTrgTblYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CRG_USER_ID = #{crgUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CRG_USER_NM = #{crgUserNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DTM = NOW() ,
RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CTD_FCY = #{ctdFcy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEL_CRI = #{delCri,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEL_MTD = #{delMtd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BCK_FCY = #{bckFcy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FULL_PATH = #{fullPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_RQST_CNTN = #{userRqstCntn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update /* WaqPdmTblMapper.updateByPrimaryKey */ WAQ_PDM_TBL set PDM_TBL_ID = #{pdmTblId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PDM_TBL_PNM = #{pdmTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PDM_TBL_LNM = #{pdmTblLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BF_PDM_TBL_PNM = #{bfPdmTblPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MDL_LNM = #{mdlLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPP_SUBJ_LNM = #{uppSubjLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUBJ_ID = #{subjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUBJ_LNM = #{subjLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STD_APL_YN = #{stdAplYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PART_TBL_YN = #{partTblYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DW_TRG_TBL_YN = #{dwTrgTblYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CRG_USER_ID = #{crgUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CRG_USER_NM = #{crgUserNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CTD_FCY = #{ctdFcy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEL_CRI = #{delCri,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEL_MTD = #{delMtd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BCK_FCY = #{bckFcy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_RQST_CNTN = #{userRqstCntn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

UPDATE /* WaqPdmTblMapper.updateCheckInit */ WAQ_PDM_TBL A LEFT JOIN WAM_PDM_TBL B ON B.PDM_TBL_PNM = A.PDM_TBL_PNM LEFT JOIN WAA_SUBJ C ON C.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND C.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND C.SUBJ_ID = B.SUBJ_ID AND C.FULL_PATH = A.FULL_PATH SET A.REG_TYP_CD = CASE WHEN A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' THEN 'D' ELSE CASE WHEN B.PDM_TBL_ID IS NULL THEN 'C' ELSE 'U' END END , A.PDM_TBL_ID = B.PDM_TBL_ID , A.VRF_CD = '4' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

/* 주제영역의 표준적용 여부에 따라 테이블 표준적용여부 업데이트 */ UPDATE /* WaqPdmTblMapper.updateStndApplybySubj */ WAQ_PDM_TBL A LEFT JOIN WAA_SUBJ B ON B.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND B.FULL_PATH = A.FULL_PATH SET A.STD_APL_YN = IFNULL(B.STD_APL_YN, 'Y') , A.SUBJ_ID = B.SUBJ_ID , A.STND_ASRT = B.STND_ASRT WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAA_SUBJ B WHERE B.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND B.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND B.FULL_PATH = A.FULL_PATH )

/* 비표준 테이블의 컬럼이 모두 표준항목 ID가 있는 경우 표준적용으로 업데이트... */ /* 사전에 컬럼의 표준항목 ID가 사전에 업데이트 되어 있어야 한다.... */ UPDATE /* WaqPdmTblMapper.updateStndApplybyCol */ WAQ_PDM_TBL A SET A.STD_APL_YN = 'Y' WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND A.STD_APL_YN != 'Y' AND (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WAQ_PDM_COL B WHERE A.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = B.RQST_SNO ) > 0 AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PDM_COL B WHERE A.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = B.RQST_SNO AND A.PDM_TBL_PNM = B.PDM_TBL_PNM AND B.SDITM_ID IS NULL )
mapper.insert: /* 검증쿼리 : 요청중인 테이블 (PT004) */ AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_MSTR E INNER JOIN WAQ_PDM_TBL D ON E.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO WHERE E.RQST_NO != #{rqstNo} AND E.RQST_STEP_CD = 'Q' AND A.PDM_TBL_PNM = D.PDM_TBL_PNM AND A.FULL_PATH = D.FULL_PATH AND IFNULL(D.RVW_STS_CD, 0) != '2' )
/* 검증쿼리 : 요청서내 중복(PT001) */ AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PDM_TBL D WHERE A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND A.FULL_PATH = D.FULL_PATH AND A.PDM_TBL_PNM = D.PDM_TBL_PNM AND A.RQST_SNO != D.RQST_SNO )
/* 검증쿼리 : 삭제대상 테이블 미존재(PT002) */ AND A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAM_PDM_TBL D WHERE A.FULL_PATH = D.FULL_PATH AND A.PDM_TBL_PNM = D.PDM_TBL_PNM AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U'))

/* 검증쿼리 : 컬럼 존재여부 체크(PT006) */
AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PDM_COL X WHERE X.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND X.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO )

/* 검증쿼리 : 변경일 때 변경된 데이터가 없을 경우 (PT000) */ AND A.REG_TYP_CD = 'U' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_PDM_TBL D WHERE A.FULL_PATH = D.FULL_PATH AND A.PDM_TBL_PNM = D.PDM_TBL_PNM AND IFNULL(A.PDM_TBL_LNM,'') = IFNULL(D.PDM_TBL_LNM,'')
AND IFNULL(A.OBJ_DESCN, '') = IFNULL(D.OBJ_DESCN, '') ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PDM_COL D WHERE D.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND D.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND D.VRF_CD = '1' ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PDM_REL E WHERE E.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND E.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO AND E.VRF_CD = '1' )

/* 검증쿼리 : 컬럼 오류가 있을 경우 체크 (PT999) */ AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PDM_COL D WHERE A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = D.RQST_SNO AND D.VRF_CD = '2' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_RQST_VRF_DTLS E WHERE D.RQST_NO = E.RQST_NO AND D.RQST_SNO = E.RQST_SNO AND D.RQST_DTL_SNO = E.RQST_DTL_SNO AND E.VRF_DTL_CD NOT IN ('PC000', 'PR000') ) ) OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PDM_REL D WHERE A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = D.RQST_SNO AND D.VRF_CD = '2' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_RQST_VRF_DTLS E WHERE D.RQST_NO = E.RQST_NO AND D.RQST_SNO = E.RQST_SNO AND D.RQST_DTL_SNO = E.RQST_DTL_SNO AND E.VRF_DTL_CD NOT IN ('PC000', 'PR000') ) )

AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PDM_REL D WHERE A.RQST_NO = D.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = D.RQST_SNO AND D.VRF_CD = '2' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_RQST_VRF_DTLS E WHERE D.RQST_NO = E.RQST_NO AND D.RQST_SNO = E.RQST_SNO AND D.RQST_DTL_SNO = E.RQST_DTL_SNO AND E.VRF_DTL_CD != 'PR000' ) )

/* 검증쿼리 : 테이블 물리명 명명규칙 (PT007) */ AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND A.STD_APL_YN = 'Y' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAA_SUBJ X WHERE X.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND X.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND X.SUBJ_LVL = 1 AND X.FULL_PATH = A.FULL_PATH AND CONCAT('PTB_', X.SUBJ_ABR_NM) != CONCAT(SUBSTR(PDM_TBL_PNM,1,8), REGEXP_REPLACE(SUBSTR(PDM_TBL_PNM,9,4),'[0-9,A-Z]','')) )

/* 검증쿼리 : 주제영역 스키마 매핑 미존재 (PT008) */ AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAA_SUBJ SUB INNER JOIN WAA_SUBJ_DB_SCH_MAP DMP ON SUB.SUBJ_ID = DMP.SUBJ_ID AND SUB.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231', '%Y%m%d') AND SUB.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND DMP.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231', '%Y%m%d') AND DMP.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE A.FULL_PATH = SUB.FULL_PATH )

/* 검증쿼리 : 시스템공통컬럼 미존재 (PT010) */ AND '6' != ( SELECT COUNT(PDM_COL_PNM) FROM WAQ_PDM_COL COL WHERE A.RQST_NO = COL.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = COL.RQST_SNO AND A.PDM_TBL_PNM = COL.PDM_TBL_PNM AND COL.PDM_COL_PNM IN ('SYS_REG_DTM','SYS_RGSR_EMNO','SYS_REG_BRCD','SYS_CHG_DTM','SYS_EDIR_EMNO','SYS_CHG_BRCD' )
)
mapper.update:
UPDATE /* WaqPdmTblMapper.updatervwStsCd */ WAQ_PDM_TBL
RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd} , RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts} , APRV_DTM = NOW() , APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId} ,
WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND VRF_CD = '1' AND IFNULL(RVW_STS_CD, '_') != '2'
mapper.sql: , PDM_TBL_PNM, PDM_TBL_LNM, SUBJ_ID, STD_APL_YN, PART_TBL_YN, DW_TRG_TBL_YN , CRG_USER_ID, RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID , RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID, CTD_FCY, DEL_CRI, DEL_MTD, BCK_FCY, FULL_PATH, USER_RQST_CNTN
mapper.select: SELECT /* WaqPdmTblMapper.selectWaqC */ * FROM WAQ_PDM_TBL WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND REG_TYP_CD = 'C'
mapper.update:
UPDATE /* WaqPdmTblMapper.updateWaqCUD */ WAQ_PDM_TBL A LEFT JOIN WAM_PDM_TBL B ON A.PDM_TBL_PNM = B.PDM_TBL_PNM INNER JOIN WAA_SUBJ C ON C.SUBJ_ID = B.SUBJ_ID AND C.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND C.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND C.FULL_PATH = A.FULL_PATH SET A.PDM_TBL_ID = B.PDM_TBL_ID ,A.OBJ_VERS = IFNULL(B.OBJ_VERS, 0) + 1 ,A.FRS_RQST_DTM = B.FRS_RQST_DTM ,A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID = B.FRS_RQST_USER_ID WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo}
AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_PDM_TBL B INNER JOIN WAA_SUBJ C ON C.SUBJ_ID = B.SUBJ_ID AND C.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND C.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE B.PDM_TBL_PNM = A.PDM_TBL_PNM AND C.FULL_PATH = A.FULL_PATH )

/* 주제영역 ID 업데이트... */ UPDATE /* WaqPdmTblMapper.updateWaqId */ WAQ_PDM_TBL X SET X.SUBJ_ID = ( SELECT MAX(A.SUBJ_ID) FROM WAA_SUBJ A WHERE A.FULL_PATH = X.FULL_PATH AND A.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') ) WHERE RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND RVW_STS_CD = '1'

/* WAH 이력 만료... */
UPDATE WAH_PDM_TBL A SET EXP_DTM = NOW() WHERE EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PDM_TBL B WHERE B.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND B.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND B.PDM_TBL_ID = A.PDM_TBL_ID )

UPDATE /* WaqPdmTblMapper.updatePdmTblIdForDdltbl */ WAM_DDL_TBL X SET X.PDM_TBL_ID = ( SELECT D.PDM_TBL_ID FROM WAH_PDM_TBL A JOIN WAM_PDM_TBL D ON A.PDM_TBL_PNM = D.PDM_TBL_PNM AND A.SUBJ_ID = D.SUBJ_ID AND A.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') WHERE A.PDM_TBL_ID = X.PDM_TBL_ID AND D.PDM_TBL_ID != X.PDM_TBL_ID ) WHERE 1=1 AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAH_PDM_TBL A JOIN WAM_PDM_TBL D ON A.PDM_TBL_PNM = D.PDM_TBL_PNM AND A.SUBJ_ID = D.SUBJ_ID AND A.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d') WHERE A.PDM_TBL_ID = X.PDM_TBL_ID AND D.PDM_TBL_ID != X.PDM_TBL_ID )
mapper.insert: INSERT /* WaqPdmTblMapper.insertWaqRejected */ INTO WAQ_PDM_TBL( RQST_NO ,RQST_SNO ,PDM_TBL_ID ,PDM_TBL_PNM ,PDM_TBL_LNM ,BF_PDM_TBL_PNM ,RQST_DCD ,RVW_STS_CD ,RVW_CONTS ,VRF_CD ,VRF_RMK ,MDL_LNM ,UPP_SUBJ_LNM ,SUBJ_ID ,SUBJ_LNM ,STD_APL_YN ,PART_TBL_YN ,DW_TRG_TBL_YN ,CRG_USER_ID ,CRG_USER_NM ,OBJ_DESCN ,OBJ_VERS ,REG_TYP_CD ,FRS_RQST_DTM ,FRS_RQST_USER_ID ,RQST_DTM ,RQST_USER_ID ,APRV_DTM ,APRV_USER_ID ,CTD_FCY ,DEL_CRI ,DEL_MTD ,BCK_FCY ,FULL_PATH ,USER_RQST_CNTN ) SELECT #{reqmst.rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,RQST_SNO ,PDM_TBL_ID ,PDM_TBL_PNM ,PDM_TBL_LNM ,BF_PDM_TBL_PNM ,RQST_DCD ,'0' ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,MDL_LNM ,UPP_SUBJ_LNM ,SUBJ_ID ,SUBJ_LNM ,STD_APL_YN ,PART_TBL_YN ,DW_TRG_TBL_YN ,CRG_USER_ID ,CRG_USER_NM ,OBJ_DESCN ,OBJ_VERS ,REG_TYP_CD ,FRS_RQST_DTM ,FRS_RQST_USER_ID ,RQST_DTM ,RQST_USER_ID ,NULL ,NULL ,CTD_FCY ,DEL_CRI ,DEL_MTD ,BCK_FCY ,FULL_PATH ,USER_RQST_CNTN FROM WAQ_PDM_TBL A WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{oldRqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.RVW_STS_CD = '2'

/* 검증쿼리 : 마스터 테이블 미존재 (PT011) */ AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_MST_TBL_MAP Z WHERE Z.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231', '%Y%m%d') AND Z.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND A.PDM_TBL_PNM = Z.HIST_DDL_TBL_PNM AND Z.MST_DDL_TBL_PNM NOT IN (SELECT PDM_TBL_PNM FROM WAQ_PDM_TBL Q WHERE Q.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) )

/* 검증쿼리 : 이력 테이블 미존재 (PT012) */ AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAM_MST_TBL_MAP Z WHERE Z.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('99991231', '%Y%m%d') AND Z.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND A.PDM_TBL_PNM = Z.MST_DDL_TBL_PNM AND Z.HIST_DDL_TBL_PNM NOT IN (SELECT PDM_TBL_PNM FROM WAQ_PDM_TBL Q WHERE Q.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) )
mapper.select: SELECT /* WaqPdmTblMapper.selectSubjDbmsTypCd */ C.DBMS_TYP_CD, C.STND_ASRT FROM WAQ_PDM_TBL A INNER JOIN WAA_SUBJ C ON C.EXP_DTM = STR_TO_DATE('9999-12-31','%Y-%m-%d') AND C.SUBJ_ID = A.SUBJ_ID WHERE A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} limit 1
